# AudioReader.MicrophoneAsyncBuffers.Iterator

**Class**

An async iterator of audio frames.

## Declaration

```swift
final class Iterator
```

## Getting the next element

- **next()**: Advances to the next element and returns it, or nil if no next element exists.

## Creating an iterator

- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Constructs an iterator.

## Conforms To

- AsyncIteratorProtocol

items.description: Advances to the next element and returns it, or nil if no next element exists.
items.name: next()
